title: HOUR 2- Kevin Harlan Sep 24, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Kevin Harlan Sep 24, 2020
description:
Kevin Harlan has a voice -off competition with Fritzy to see who can tell who the real Kevin Harlan is. Dan and Kevin discuss who their mentors were in broadcasting growing up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
